#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

#define s(x) scanf("%d", &x)

vector <int> v;
int isP[10011];

void sieve()
{
    int i, j;
    for (i = 2; i <= 10000; i++) {
        if (!isP[i]) {
            for (j = 2; i*j <= 10000; j++)
                isP[i*j] = 1;
            v.push_back(i);
        }
    }
}

void get_ans(int ind, int tot_one, int mul, int size, int n, int &ans, vector <int> &tmp)
{
    if (ind == size) {
        if (!tot_one)
            return;
        if (tot_one&1)
            ans -= (n/mul);
        else
            ans += (n/mul);
        return;
    }
    get_ans(ind+1, tot_one, mul, size, n, ans, tmp);
    get_ans(ind+1, tot_one+1, mul*tmp[ind], size, n, ans, tmp);
}

int main()
{
    sieve();
    int t, n, i, ans;
    s(t);
    while (t--) {
        s(n);
        vector <int> tmp;
        for (i = 0; i < v.size(); i++) {
            if (n % v[i] == 0)
                tmp.push_back(v[i]);
        }
        ans = n;
        get_ans(0, 0, 1, tmp.size(), n, ans, tmp);
        cout << ans << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
